LanguageData.MessageFailToUnscrambleMemoryStick: {0} has failed to unscramble memory stick.
LanguageData.PolarisblocConsolationPrize: Congratulations！ You have received a consolation prize from our company. Please make persistent efforts!\n\n----Polarisbloc.
LanguageData.PolarisblocSurprised: Congratulations！ You have received a luxurious gift from our company, one of the immeasurable 666th anniversary commemorative sculptures. Thank you for your support!\n\n----Polarisbloc.
LanguageData.PlrsNoEnoughEnergyToDoExplosion: It has no enough energy to do an explosion!
LanguageData.PlrsDoExplosionDESC: You can pay 50 energy to do an explosion around you.Don't worry,it won't hurt yourself.
LanguageData.PlrsLightningActiveDESC: When you active it,a lightning will strike back to the damage instigator.
